wikipedia_page.main: Candida Yda Reid (born 1977) is a British journalist who was a sports anchor for CNN International based in Atlanta, GA.  She has since returned to the United Kingdom where she coaches youth tennis and serves as tennis match analyst/co-commentator on television video world feeds of Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) lower tier tournaments such as ATP 250 events, as well as world feeds of Women Tennis Association (WTA) events.
